mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_follows (follower_id, following_id, created_at) VALUES (#{followerId}, #{followingId}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_follows WHERE follower_id = #{followerId} AND following_id = #{followingId}
mapper.select: SELECT uf.id, uf.follower_id, uf.following_id, uf.created_at, u1.username as follower_username, u2.username as following_username FROM user_follows uf LEFT JOIN users u1 ON uf.follower_id = u1.id LEFT JOIN users u2 ON uf.following_id = u2.id WHERE uf.following_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uf.created_at DESC
